query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE SET NAME=?,DATASET_ID=?, EXPORT_FORMAT_ID=?,FILE_REFERENCE=?,FILE_SIZE=?,RUN_TIME=?, OWNER_ID=? WHERE ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE_ID=?

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO ARCHIVED_DATASET_FILE (NAME, DATASET_ID, EXPORT_FORMAT_ID, FILE_REFERENCE, FILE_SIZE, RUN_TIME, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: SELECT archived_dataset_file_id_seq.currval AS key from dual
